Text.Page:
Did you know there's no known antidote for the bite of the {@LinkCreature:39#160#dreadfang arachnen}? I've just received orders to get venom samplesâ€”the federation wants to put some researchers on the task.

I want you on this job, so if you're willing, bring me back some fangs. Should be plenty of venom in there.

Well done. I'll get these off to the federation scholars right away.

This is a victory for all of us.

Every time one of those {@LinkCreature:39#160#dreadfang arachnens} bites one of our people, they die.

There's not a lot of time to waste.
